title: how do you link your league account to facebook to get that mystery cahmp in the pool party event
body: how do you link your league account to facebook to get that mystery cahmp in the pool party event

replies.body: Yeah, the instruction page doesn't exist so nyeh. How do?

The instruction page only exists for NA because, and I quote from the instruction page "The option to discover which of your Facebook friends play League too is now live in North America! Read on for how it works!" it's apparently an in-progress soft-launch in the other regions.

Though the FAQ is also out of date, the link won't work unless you agree to giving Riot your email address. This directly contradicts the answer:

> Tell me exactly what info Riot gets from Facebook when I approve this connection.
> We only receive your friends list, your name and your profile picture. We do not get your location, address or anything else from Facebook.

http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/features/find-your-irl-friends-league
http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/features/faq-add-friends

Hey

There is a [news article](http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/features/find-your-irl-friends-league-now) about this feature, along with an [FAQ page](http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/faq-add-friends) which should help.

Cheers!
